article.title: Organizers

inserts.name: /events/gcc2014/header
inserts.content:
[](/src/events/gcc2014/index.md)

Slides, posters, and videos are now available; and GCC2018 is coming!

article.content:
Organizing Committee -------------------- The GCC2014 Organizing Committee is responsible for event planning. **[Dave Clements](/people/dave-clements/)** [Johns Hopkins University](http://jhu.edu/)

**[Mohammad Heydarian](http://epigenetics.jhu.edu/?section=personnelPages\&personID=26)** [Johns Hopkins University](http://jhu.edu/)

**[Dan MacLean](http://www.tsl.ac.uk/staff/dan-maclean/)** [The Sainsbury Laboratory](http://www.tsl.ac.uk/)

**[Karen Reddy](http://biolchem.bs.jhmi.edu/pages/facultydetail.aspx?FID=343)** [Johns Hopkins University](http://jhu.edu/)

Questions? Send the organizers an \[email]\(mailto:gcc2014 DASH org AT groups DOT galaxyproject DOT org). Scientific Committee -------------------- The GCC2014 Scientific Program Committee is responsible for meeting content, including reviewing and accepting talks, posters, and lightning talks. **[Jeremy Goecks](/people/jeremy-goecks/)** [George Washington University](http://www.gwu.edu/)

**[Jessica Kissinger](http://mango.ctegd.uga.edu/jkissingLab/)** [University of Georgia](http://uga.edu)

**[Anton Nekrutenko](/people/anton/)** [Penn State University](http://psu.edu/)

**[Karen Reddy](http://biolchem.bs.jhmi.edu/pages/facultydetail.aspx?FID=343)** [Johns Hopkins University](http://jhu.edu/)

**[James Taylor](/people/james-taylor/)** [Johns Hopkins University](http://jhu.edu/)

The Scientific Program Committee can \[be reached via email]\(mailto:gcc2014 DASH org AT groups DOT galaxyproject DOT org). Hackathon Committee ------------------- The GCC2014 Hackathon Organizing Committee is responsible for making the [accompanying hackathon](/events/gcc2014/hackathon/) happen. **[Dannon Baker](/people/dannon-baker/)** [Johns Hopkins University](http://jhu.edu/)

**[Brad Chapman](http://bcbio.wordpress.com/about/)** [Harvard University](http://compbio.sph.harvard.edu/chb/)

**[John Chilton](/people/john-chilton/)** [Penn State University](http://psu.edu/)

**[Kyle Ellrott](https://twitter.com/kellrott)** [University of California Santa Cruz (UCSC)](http://www.soe.ucsc.edu/people/kellrott) The Hackathon Organizing Committee can \[be reached via email]\(mailto:gcc2014 DASH hack DASH org AT groups DOT galaxyproject DOT org).
